verses.verse: וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you שָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> Moreover take thou up קִינָ֔ה <S%H7015><s%> a lamentation אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for נְשִׂיאֵ֖י <S%H5387><s%> for the princes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <S%H559><s%> And say מָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> What אִמְּךָ֙ <S%H517><s%> your mother לְבִיָּ֔א <S%H3833><s%> great בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> among אֲרָי֖וֹת <S%H738><s%> among lions רָבָ֑צָה <S%H7257><s%> she lay down בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among כְּפִרִ֖ים <S%H3715><s%> young lions רִבְּתָ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> she nourished גוּרֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H1482><s%> her whelps

וַתַּ֛עַל <S%H5927><s%> And she brought up אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> one מִגֻּרֶ֖יהָ <S%H1482><s%> of her whelps כְּפִ֣יר <S%H3715><s%> it became a young lion הָיָ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> became וַיִּלְמַ֥ד <S%H3925><s%> and it learned לִטְרָף־ <S%H2963><s%> to catch טֶ֖רֶף <S%H2964><s%> the prey אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> men אָכָֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> it devoured

וַיִּשְׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> also heard אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> about גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> The nations בְּשַׁחְתָּ֣ם <S%H7845><s%> in their pit נִתְפָּ֑שׂ <S%H8610><s%> of him he was taken וַיְבִאֻ֥הוּ <S%H935><s%> and they brought בַֽחַחִ֖ים <S%H2397><s%> him with chains אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַתֵּ֙רֶא֙ <S%H7200><s%> Now when she saw כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for נֽוֹחֲלָ֔ה <S%H3176><s%> that she had waited אָבְדָ֖ה <S%H6><s%> was lost תִּקְוָתָ֑הּ <S%H8615><s%> [and] her hope וַתִּקַּ֛ח <S%H3947><s%> then she took אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> another מִגֻּרֶ֖יהָ <S%H1482><s%> of her whelps כְּפִ֥יר <S%H3715><s%> him a young lion שָׂמָֽתְהוּ׃ <S%H7760><s%> [and] made

וַיִּתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> And he went up and down בְּתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> among אֲרָי֖וֹת <S%H738><s%> the lions כְּפִ֣יר <S%H3715><s%> he became a young lion הָיָ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> became וַיִּלְמַ֥ד <S%H3925><s%> and learned לִטְרָף־ <S%H2963><s%> to catch טֶ֖רֶף <S%H2964><s%> the prey אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> men אָכָֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> [and] devoured

וַיֵּ֙דַע֙ <S%H3045><s%> And he knew אַלְמְנוֹתָ֔יו <S%H490><s%> their desolate palaces וְעָרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5892><s%> their cities הֶחֱרִ֑יב <S%H2717><s%> and he laid waste וַתֵּ֤שַׁם <S%H3456><s%> was desolate אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> and the land וּמְלֹאָ֔הּ <S%H4393><s%> and the fulness מִקּ֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> thereof by the noise שַׁאֲגָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H7581><s%> of his roaring

וַיִּתְּנ֨וּ <S%H5414><s%> set עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> against גּוֹיִ֛ם <S%H1471><s%> Then the nations סָבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> against him on every side מִמְּדִינ֑וֹת <S%H4082><s%> from the provinces וַֽיִּפְרְשׂ֥וּ <S%H6566><s%> and spread עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> over רִשְׁתָּ֖ם <S%H7568><s%> their net בְּשַׁחְתָּ֥ם <S%H7845><s%> in their pit נִתְפָּֽשׂ׃ <S%H8610><s%> over him he was taken

וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֤הוּ <S%H5414><s%> And they put בַסּוּגַר֙ <S%H5474><s%> him in ward בַּֽחַחִ֔ים <S%H2397><s%> in chains וַיְבִאֻ֖הוּ <S%H935><s%> and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> him to the king בָּבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon יְבִאֻ֙הוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> they brought בַּמְּצֹד֔וֹת <S%H4686><s%> castle לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> So לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִשָּׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> should no more be heard קוֹל֛וֹ <S%H6963><s%> that his voice ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הָרֵ֥י <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ

אִמְּךָ֥ <S%H517><s%> Thy mother כַגֶּ֛פֶן <S%H1612><s%> [is] like a vine בְּדָמְךָ֖ <S%H1818><s%> bloodshed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> by the waters שְׁתוּלָ֑ה <S%H8362><s%> planted פֹּֽרִיָּה֙ <S%H6509><s%> she was fruitful וַֽעֲנֵפָ֔ה <S%H6058><s%> and full of branches הָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become מִמַּ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> by reason of many

וַיִּֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> had לָ֞הּ מַטּ֣וֹת <S%H4294><s%> rods עֹ֗ז <S%H5797><s%> And she had strong אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שִׁבְטֵי֙ <S%H7626><s%> for the sceptres מֹֽשְׁלִ֔ים <S%H4910><s%> of them that bare rule וַתִּגְבַּ֥הּ <S%H1361><s%> was exalted קֽוֹמָת֖וֹ <S%H6967><s%> and her stature עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> among עֲבֹתִ֑ים <S%H5688><s%> among the thick branches וַיֵּרָ֣א <S%H7200><s%> and she appeared בְגָבְה֔וֹ <S%H1363><s%> in her height בְּרֹ֖ב <S%H7230><s%> with the multitude דָּלִיֹּתָֽיו׃ <S%H1808><s%> of her branches

וַתֻּתַּ֤שׁ <S%H5428><s%> But she was plucked up בְּחֵמָה֙ <S%H2534><s%> in fury לָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the ground הֻשְׁלָ֔כָה <S%H7993><s%> she was cast down וְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind הַקָּדִ֖ים <S%H6921><s%> and the east הוֹבִ֣ישׁ <S%H3001><s%> dried up פִּרְיָ֑הּ <S%H6529><s%> her fruit הִתְפָּרְק֧וּ <S%H6561><s%> were broken וְיָבֵ֛שׁוּ <S%H3001><s%> and withered מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> rods עֻזָּ֖הּ <S%H5797><s%> her strong אֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire אֲכָלָֽתְהוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> consumed

וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> and now שְׁתוּלָ֣ה <S%H8362><s%> And now she [is] planted בַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ground צִיָּ֥ה <S%H6723><s%> in a dry וְצָמָֽא׃ <S%H6772><s%> and thirsty

וַתֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> is gone out אֵ֜שׁ <S%H784><s%> And fire מִמַּטֵּ֤ה <S%H4294><s%> of a rod בַדֶּ֙יהָ֙ <S%H905><s%> of her branches פִּרְיָ֣הּ <S%H6529><s%> her fruit אָכָ֔לָה <S%H398><s%> [which] hath devoured וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and has הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> become בָ֛הּ מַטֵּה־ <S%H4294><s%> rod עֹ֖ז <S%H5797><s%> so that she hath no strong שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> [to be] a sceptre לִמְשׁ֑וֹל <S%H4910><s%> to rule קִ֥ינָה <S%H7015><s%> This [is] a lamentation הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he וַתְּהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become לְקִינָֽה׃ <S%H7015><s%> and shall be for a lamentation פ
